clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in femur, suggestive of malignancy.
Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
Mild inflammatory uptake in femur region.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
recommendations: Refer to oncology or specialist for further management.
